plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?
I am tall and have a trunk and leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves fall off in the autumn.

plant.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on a plant. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me... maybe a little too much.
🌱 I grow on trees or bushes.

plant.question: I am yellow and sweet, and grow inside a green husk. You can eat me right off the cob. What am I?
I am colorful and smell nice. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and smell really good, I often have pink or red flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me to each other as a sign of love.
⚠️ Be careful, I can poke you!
🥀 I am often used in perfumes.

plant.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 You can see well in the dark if you eat me.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. You can grind me into flour to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often used to make bread!

plant.question: I am a plant with a big, round orange fruit. People carve faces into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am a symbol of Autumn.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant with a thick stalk and large leaves. Pandas love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I'm a favorite food of pandas.
🎍 I am often used to make furniture.

transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?
I float on the water. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓️ I carry people across the water.
🚢 Pirates sometimes sail on me too!

transport.question: I fly in the sky, whoosh! What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I can take you to faraway places.

transport.question: I am red and loud. I help put out fires. What am I?
I ride on two wheels and you can pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🦽 You use your feet to make me go.

transport.question: I go underground and carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ You ride me to get to different places in the city.
💡 I'm long and have many carriages.

transport.question: I take you to school. I am big and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I pick you up in the morning.

transport.question: I take you to the moon and stars. What am I?
I fly but I don't have wings. I have a big spinny blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🚑 I can be used as an ambulance.
🛬 I don't need a long runway to land.

transport.question: I carry lots of things and go 'choo choo' on the tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I have many cars attached to me.
📦 I can transport items from one place to another.
